review: This thing is the cats meow!
author: Crownman

review: We had both an Apple TV and Fire Stick plugged into the same TV, the Fire Stick kept dropping WiFi while the Apple TV worked great. Moved it to a different TV closer to the router, and after working for like a week it won't even turn on anymore. Try to turn it on and the TV shows that the input is active but the screen just turns black. Glad I paid the $19 for it, because I doubt I will ever get even that back from Amazon.
author: Joshua Boehm

review: It works pretty good when it's not complaining it can't connect to the router. Seems like it overheats on occasion. I had to send it back for a replacement already due to this. Have had some minor issue with the replacement but not as bad. Disappointed they have blocked the ability to install Kodi directly.
author: Ryan Mann
